message.content:
1. The statement is referring to a study or comparison that took place over 56 days.
2. There were recurrent infections in the chloroquine arm.
3. The rate of recurrent infections in the chloroquine arm was 8.9%.
4. The 95% confidence interval for the rate of recurrent infections in the chloroquine arm was 6.0-13.1%.
5. There were also recurrent infections in the dihydroartemisinin-piperaquine arm.
6. The rate of recurrent infections in the dihydroartemisinin-piperaquine arm was 2.8%.
7. The 95% confidence interval for the rate of recurrent infections in the dihydroartemisinin-piperaquine arm was 1.4-5.8%.
8. The difference in cumulative recurrence rate between the two arms was 6.1%.
9. The 2-sided 90% confidence interval for the difference in cumulative recurrence rate was +2.6 to +9.7%.
10. The chloroquine arm had a higher rate of recurrent infections than the dihydroartemisinin-piperaquine arm.

messages.content:
Statement: At day 56, there were more recurrent infections in the chloroquine arm (8.9%, 95% CI 6.0-13.1%) than the dihydroartemisinin-piperaquine arm (2.8%, 95% CI 1.4-5.8%), a difference in cumulative recurrence rate of 6.1% (2-sided 90%CI +2.6 to +9.7%).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
